name: I Caught Santa Claus
description:
This game is made with unreal engine 5, it is recommended you play with a higher end pc (sorry if your computer explodes).

It's Christmas

and there's sounds downstairs, who could it be? It's Santa of course!

Go downstairs and take a photo of your favourite gift giver in this (very) short horror experience, so you can show everyone he really exists, what's the worst that could happen?

There's more than meets the eye to this game, so keep a look out ;)

P.S Santa isn't eating cookies this year

(Contains flashing lights and loud sounds)

Made in a short amount of time, since I had a change of plans with some other projects :)

Have fun and stay tuned!

~JR
